short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple, quick and user friendly extension to enhance your experience on Wikipedia websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple, quick and user friendly extension to enhance your experience on Wikipedia articles. It saves your data usage and gives you articles' short snippets without diverting you from the current article. Just hover your mouse on links that you see in the articles.
